question: What is a good Dua to make for immediate response from Allah (SWT)?
answer:
QUESTION
Dear respected Mufti, I'm a young muslimah and want to get married very soon, would you please tell me what is the best dua to make to get married beside istikhara. I have had many good proposal but refused all. My problem is cannt say "yes" so please help me in this manner. wa Salam
ANSWER


Share:
You state that you want to get married but you refuse good proposals. We do
not know the reason for you not being able to say yes. There could be many
probabilities to that and until we do not know the exact reason, we are
unable to assist you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
